name: Abraham Link Coln
description:
Abraham Link Coln freed the Raggamuffins of Dessert Island, all the cakes, fruits and items loves the big bearded hero but not everybody loves Link Coln, John Wilkes Ganondorf kill him at Fords Theater in front of all the raggamuffins all that mix with some of previous games Explores the island, play all minigames and find all the medal before you get shoot. Use Arrows to move X to Talk all character talk 4 lines, press x till the end of conversation, dont miss a thing. Z actions C if you has the sword B if you has bombs R Restart A show the sticker almbum (medal collector) Use mouse on Little Green Cursor Level

WARNING BAD ENGLISH AHEAD
